title: LM Container Helm chart Values Schema
description: LM Container Helm chart Values Schema

accessID.title: Logicmonitor API Token accessID
accessID.description:
The LogicMonitor API key ID.
NOTE: Ensure to add surrounding double quotes to avoid special character parsing errors.

accessKey.title: Logicmonitor API Token accessKey
accessKey.description:
The LogicMonitor API key.
NOTE: Ensure to add surrounding double quotes to avoid special character parsing errors.

account.title: Logicmonitor account name
account.description:
The LogicMonitor account name.nValue should be trimmed from URL "___.logicmonitor.com"
example: lmqauat.logicmonitor.com then "lmqauat" must be a valid value.

argus.title: Argus Configurations, check https://artifacthub.io/packages/helm/logicmonitor-helm-charts/argus?modal=values-schema for schema
argus.description: Argus Helm Chart Configurations, for detailed schema visit https://artifacthub.io/packages/helm/logicmonitor-helm-charts/argus?modal=values-schema

clusterName.title: Friendly Cluster Name
clusterName.description:
The unique name to give to the cluster's resource group.
NOTE: You must not change the name once the application is deployed in the cluster. If changed, breaks correlation at multiple places
example: Organised Resource group name of Kubernetes resource tree, is generated as "Kubernetes Cluster: <clusterName>"

clusterTreeParentID.title: The clusterTreeParentID
clusterTreeParentID.description:
clusterTreeParentID is a parent static resource group ID under which the organised Kubernetes resource tree gets created.
A static resource group with the mentioned ID should exit beforehand.

collectorset-controller.title: Collectorset Controller Configurations, check https://artifacthub.io/packages/helm/logicmonitor-helm-charts/collectorset-controller?modal=values-schema for schema
collectorset-controller.description: Collectorset Controller Helm Chart Configurations for detailed schema visit https://artifacthub.io/packages/helm/logicmonitor-helm-charts/collectorset-controller?modal=values-schema

enabled.title: The enabled schema
enabled.description: Describes the flag to enable kube-state-metrics helm chart installation

replicas.title: The replicas schema
replicas.description: Describes the number of kube-state-metrics pod replicas

collectors.title: The collectors schema
collectors.description: Describes the list of collector to enable metrics collection by kube-state-metrics
